L'isteria di "Bitcoin NFT" arriva da Sotheby's con il personaggio del fungo in stile Super Mario che supera i 200.000 dollari https://www.coindesk.com/it/tech/2023/12/14/bitcoin-nft-hysteria-comes-to-sothebys-as-super-mario-style-mushroom-character-tops-200k/?utm_medium =referral&utm_source=rss&utm_campaign=头条新闻RGTUKPZ34RCZROFHOSARCDO6PA Bradley KeounNella prima vendita in assoluto delle iscrizioni degli Ordinali da parte della storica casa d'aste, nota come "NFT su Bitcoin", un lotto di tre immagini pixelate provenienti da una collezione a tema funghi ha fruttato circa $ 450.000, ovvero circa cinque volte le stime più alte. Thu, 14 Dec 2023 21:39:39 +0000 2023-12-14T21:44:46.960+00:00it - TechnewsBitcoinOrdinalsOrdinals protocolSotheby’sNFTsItalianScreenshot of BitcoinShrooms website showing items from the collection. (Bitcoinshrooms.com)
'Bitcoin NFT' Hysteria Comes to Sotheby's as Super-Mario-Style Mushroom Character Tops $200K https://www.coindesk.com/tech/2023/12/14/bitcoin-nft-hysteria-comes-to-sothebys-as-super-mario-style-mushroom-character-tops-200k/?utm_medium=referral&utm_source =rss&utm_campaign=头条新闻GPPFZJ5YDVGC7GDXJPX462IAJA Bradley KeounIn the historic auction house's first-ever sale of the Ordinals inscriptions known as "NFTs on Bitcoin," a batch of three pixelated images from a mushroom-themed collection drew about $450,000, or roughly five times the highest estimates. Thu, 14 Dec 2023 21:39:39 +0000 2023-12-14T21:44:39.818+00:00 TechnologynewsBitcoinOrdinalsOrdinals protocolSotheby’sNFTstop newsScreenshot of BitcoinShrooms website showing items from the collection. (Bitcoinshrooms.com)
A histeria do ' Bitcoin NFT' chega à Sotheby's quando o personagem cogumelo estilo Super Mario chega a US$ 200 mil https://www.coindesk.com/pt-br/tech/2023/12/14/bitcoin-nft-hysteria-comes-to-sothebys-as-super-mario-style-mushroom-character-tops-200k/ ?utm_medium=推荐&utm_source=rss&utm_campaign=标题BXJVDRG665AONOUOY5FR727ABA Bradley KeounNa primeira venda das inscrições Ordinals da histórica casa de leilões, conhecida como “NFTs no Bitcoin”, um lote de três imagens pixeladas de uma coleção com tema de cogumelo atraiu cerca de US$ 450.000, ou cerca de cinco vezes as estimativas mais altas. Thu, 14 Dec 2023 21:39:39 +0000 2023-12-14T21:44:50.661+00:00 pt-br - TechnewsBitcoinOrdinalsOrdinals protocolSotheby’sNFTsPortugueseScreenshot of BitcoinShrooms website showing items from the collection. (Bitcoinshrooms.com)
L'hystérie «Bitcoin NFT » arrive chez Sotheby's alors que le personnage de champignon de style Super-Mario dépasse 200 000 $ https://www.coindesk.com/fr/tech/2023/12/14/bitcoin-nft-hysteria-comes-to-sothebys-as-super-mario-style-mushroom-character-tops-200k/?utm_medium =referral&utm_source=rss&utm_campaign=头条新闻N2WFHJBH6BDRVEURFG6A722GX4 Bradley KeounLors de la toute première vente par la maison de ventes aux enchères historique des inscriptions Ordinals connues sous le nom de « NFT sur Bitcoin», un lot de trois images pixellisées provenant d'une collection sur le thème des champignons a rapporté environ 450 000 $, soit environ cinq fois les estimations les plus élevées. Thu, 14 Dec 2023 21:39:39 +0000 2023-12-14T21:44:54.280+00:00fr - TechnewsBitcoinOrdinalsOrdinals protocolSotheby’sNFTsFrenchScreenshot of BitcoinShrooms website showing items from the collection. (Bitcoinshrooms.com)
Cripto-amigável não significa cripto-fácil https://www.coindesk.com/pt-br/consensus-magazine/2023/12/14/crypto-friend-does-not-mean-crypto-easy/?utm_medium=referral&utm_source=rss&utm_campaign=headlines SN7J3K4FWNHPRFCXGUYBQQGW6A Emily ParkerA regulamentação criptográfica dos EUA tem muito a aprender com o Japão, Singapura e Hong Kong. Mas embora essas jurisdições ofereçam clareza jurídica em relação aos ativos digitais, elas também têm algumas das regras mais rígidas do mundo, diz Emily Parker, da CoinDesk. Thu, 14 Dec 2023 20:21:43 +0000 2023-12-14T20:27:14.303+00:00 pt-br - Consensus MagazineopinionOpinionRegulationPortugueseHong Kong (Ruslan Bardash/Unsplash)
Crypto-Friendly Does Not Mean Crypto-Easy https://www.coindesk.com/consensus-magazine/2023/12/14/crypto-friend-does-not-mean-crypto-easy/?utm_medium=referral&utm_source=rss&utm_campaign=headlines YF5S4UMATFDCRPT6INPVAOTVOA Emily ParkerU.S. crypto regulation has much to learn from Japan, Singapore and Hong Kong. But while these jurisdictions offer legal clarity around digital assets, they also have some of the toughest rules in the world, says CoinDesk’s Emily Parker. Thu, 14 Dec 2023 20:21:43 +0000 2023-12-14T20:27:03.201+00:00 Consensus MagazineopinionOpinionRegulationHong Kong (Ruslan Bardash/Unsplash)
Cripto-friendly non significa cripto-facile https://www.coindesk.com/it/consensus-magazine/2023/12/14/crypto-friend-does-not-mean-crypto-easy/?utm_medium=referral&utm_source=rss&utm_campaign=headlines NW5VXGZ4JFDR3HZX7OVV4655ZQ Emily ParkerLa regolamentazione statunitense delle criptovalute ha molto da imparare da Giappone, Singapore e Hong Kong. Ma sebbene queste giurisdizioni offrano chiarezza giuridica sulle risorse digitali, hanno anche alcune delle regole più severe al mondo, afferma Emily Parker di CoinDesk. Thu, 14 Dec 2023 20:21:43 +0000 2023-12-14T20:27:10.523+00:00 it - Consensus MagazineopinionOpinionRegulationItalianHong Kong (Ruslan Bardash/Unsplash)
Crypto-friendly ne signifie pas crypto-facile https://www.coindesk.com/fr/consensus-magazine/2023/12/14/crypto-friend-does-not-mean-crypto-easy/?utm_medium=referral&utm_source=rss&utm_campaign=headlines IHD37SFSUJHDVC3OGMHFD5HCA4 Emily ParkerLa réglementation américaine en matière de cryptographie a beaucoup à apprendre du Japon, de Singapour et de Hong Kong. Mais si ces juridictions offrent une clarté juridique concernant les actifs numériques, elles appliquent également certaines des règles les plus strictes au monde, déclare Emily Parker de CoinDesk. Thu, 14 Dec 2023 20:21:43 +0000 2023-12-14T20:27:17.947+00:00 fr - Consensus MagazineopinionOpinionRegulationFrenchHong Kong (Ruslan Bardash/Unsplash)
